TEXT.S: Wu Lei kawas tay 1999, ryax sa tay 26 nqu tay 12, Wu Lei, squliq na Cyukoku'. qyanux na sraral Wu Lei minkahul Shanghai na Cyukoku. pinqbaqan nya Wu Lei, t'aring kawas tay 2017 tehuk kawas tay 2021, mqwas biru sa Beijing ega' pqwsan biru krahu. qnxan nya mintzyuwaw nya Wu Lei hiya ga m'engi. Wu Lei ima pincyuwagan nya zyuwaw ga (2015), (2022)
